section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Department" means the Department of Business and Economic Development.
"Eligible business" has the meaning stated in § 5-451 of the Economic Development Article.
"Lender" has the meaning stated in § 5-451 of the Economic Development Article.

text.section: The Department and the State are not liable to any lender for payment of the principal or interest on a loan to an eligible business in accordance with § 5-451 of the Economic Development Article.
